allow:
Bash(echo "# Database
DATABASE_URL=""postgresql://postgres:password@localhost:5432/kaspi_analytics""

# Kaspi Merchant API
KASPI_API_URL=""https://kaspi.kz/shop/api/v2""
KASPI_MERCHANT_ID=""""
KASPI_API_KEY=""""
KASPI_API_SECRET=""""

# NextAuth
NEXTAUTH_URL=""http://localhost:3000""
NEXTAUTH_SECRET=""kaspi-analytics-secret-change-me""

# Email Configuration
SMTP_HOST=""smtp.gmail.com""
SMTP_PORT=587
SMTP_USER=""""
SMTP_PASSWORD=""""
EMAIL_FROM=""noreply@yourcompany.com""

# Application
NODE_ENV=""development""")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Metricon landing page, login/register pages, and full dashboard

- Create modern landing page with pricing, features, FAQ sections
- Add login page with demo credentials \(demo@kaspi.kz / demo123\)
- Add two-step registration form
- Fix input field icon overlap using flex layout
- Update dashboard analytics link
- Add warehouse management with order creation
- Include all API routes and components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
